name: ScleralDepressedExam
title: Scleral depressed exam
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is to capture scleral depression was performed during examination of the eye.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: This set of values includes codes that contain scleral depression.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that do not meet inclusion criteria are excluded.)

concept.display: Ophthalmoscopy, extended; with retinal drawing and scleral depression of peripheral retinal disease (eg, for retinal tear, retinal detachment, retinal tumor) with interpretation and report, unilateral or bilateral

contains.display: Ophthalmoscopy, extended; with retinal drawing and scleral depression of peripheral retinal disease (eg, for retinal tear, retinal detachment, retinal tumor) with interpretation and report, unilateral or bilateral
